anime.description: The main protagonist http://anidb.net/ch25900 [Sendou Aichi], is a timid and mundane third-year middle school boy. The thing that supported Aichi`s heart, was the "Blaster Blade" card that he received as a child. It`s an important rare card from "Vanguard", a card game with the imaginary world of "Planet Cray" as its stage. From the day he reunited with the person who gave him that card "Toshiki Kai", Aichi`s everyday life began to change. Source: crunchyroll

tag.name: shounen
tag.description: In the context of manga and associated media, shounen, literally meaning "youth" and often also specifically "boy", refers to a male audience roughly between the ages of 10 and 18. Source: Wikipedia

tag.name: target audience
tag.description: Anime, like everything else in the modern world, is targeted towards specific audiences, both implicitly by the creators and overtly by the marketing. While categories are associated with specific sex and age groups, this is not a bar on the anime being enjoyed by people who don`t fit into that band; not only do crossover titles exist, but the categories also have a considerable following outside their main demographic, and a person might as well enjoy anime from all categories. Still, does not invalidate the usefulness of marking a title as one of the categories; the same themes will likely be treated differently in anime geared for different audiences. Only one should not jump the gun and assume that a title will be more or less serious or present content in this or that way due to its target audience, or conversely assume the target audience on the content and its presentation alone. As such, the audience categories help form a broad impression of how a title might work with the announced themes, but offer little to no in-depth information about specific content or its treatment. The audience categories originate from manga magazines, which group titles of a same intended audience into a magazine that is advertised as belonging to that category, and so manga-based anime will have the category from their parent work. As for anime based on other works, the audience is often debatable, but comparing information such as time slot to the manga-based anime generally helps figure out the most likely possibility. If the parent material was classified under multiple audiences over time (for example, it was originally shounen, but then as the plot changed and became more mature, it was reclassified as seinen), and the anime adapts parent material time periods covering multiple audiences, we tag all audiences covered by the anime adaptation.

tag.name: themes
tag.description: Themes describe the very central elements important to the anime stories. They set the backdrop against which the protagonists must face their challenges. Be it School Life, present Daily Life, Military action, Cyberpunk, Law and Order detective work, Sports, or the Underworld. These are only but a few of the more typical backgrounds for anime plots. Add to that a Conspiracy setting with a possible tragic outcome, the Themes span most of the imaginable subject matter relevant to anime.

tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: proxy battles
tag.description: In our terms, a proxy battle is a battle where humans use creatures/robots to do the fighting for them, either by commanding those creatures/robots or by simply evolving them/changing them into battle mode. Often the training aspect is also involved, or in some cases the proxies are nothing more than holographic representatives of some other variation of competition (like for example a card game). While many popular shounen anime fit under this category, it`s not limited to shounen anime.

episode.title: ミサキのひみつ!!
Misaki`s Secret!!
Misaki no Himitsu!!
episode.summary: Misaki Tokura, a shop assistant inexperienced with cardfighting, becomes interested in Vanguard upon seeing how Aichi Sendou evolves. With an invitation from Aichi, Misaki steps up to her first fight. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最強ファイターは誰だ!!
Who`s the Strongest Cardfighter!!
Saikyou Fighter wa Dare Da!!
episode.summary: A young cardfighter, Kamui Katsuragi, heads towards Card Capital in order to become the strongest cardfighter. Kai nominates Aichi, who happens to be at the shop, to fight Kamui. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ライド・ザ・ヴァンガード!!
Ride the Vanguard!!
Ride the Vanguard!!
episode.summary: Aichi Sendou challenges Toshiki Kai to a cardfight in order to get his card, Blaster Blade, back. As Kai teaches Aichi about the rules, he notices Aichi’s smile during the fight. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: スタンドアップ・ヴァンガード!!
Stand Up, Vanguard!!
Start Up Vanguard!!
episode.summary: Aichi Sendou, a timid youth who gets his precious card taken by his classmate, Katsumi Morikawa. Aichi goes after Morikawa, and heads towards a card shop called Card Capital. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 波乱!! Q4 VS NwO
Turbulence!! Q4 VS NwO
Haran!! Q4 vs NwO
episode.summary: The shop battle begins with Card Capital`s representative, Team Q4, facing off against Voyage`s representative, Team NwO. Gouki Daimonji and his sister Nagisa are the first members that Q4 needs to defeat. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 結成!! Q4[クアドリフォリオ]
Unite!! Q4 (Quadrifoglio)
Kessei!! Quadriforio
episode.summary: Kenji Mitsusada joins and forms a team at "Voyage" with the other members of Asia Circuit`s top 3, and is set to participate in the shop battle. One day, Mitsusada visits Card Capital without notice. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 宣戦布告!! ショップ対抗戦
Declaration of War!! Battle of the Shops
Sensenfukoku!! Shop Taikousen
episode.summary: Aichi and the rest encounter Leon Soryu, champion of the Asia Circuit, and Gouki Daimonji, runner-up, at the grand Cardshop "Voyage"that Kamui Katsuragi originally played at. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: カードキャピタルに行こう!!
Let`s Go to Card Capital!!
Card Capital ni Ikou!!
episode.summary: Aichi Sendou applies to join the CF Research Club that Katsumi Morikawa and the rest are in. However, CF Research Club faces the crisis of being abolished with the grades of Morikawa and the rest being far below acceptable. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 謎の敵・フーファイター!!
Mysterious Adversary Asteroid!!
Nazo no Teki Foo Fighter!!
episode.summary: Minami Kawanami, a member of the mysterious group "Asteroid", appears at Card Capital. The "VF Glove" that they use appears to be dangerous item that allows the damage of cardfights to manifest. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 男たちの戦い!!
Battle of Men!!
Otoko-tachi no Tatakai!!
episode.summary: Kamui Katsuragi and Gouki Daimonji battle in the deciding match. While trying to defeat Gouki, Kamui recalls what Gouki once said to him. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アイチの風!!
Wind of Aichi!!
Aichi no Kaze!!
episode.summary: Fourth match of the shop battle has Aichi Sendou facing off against Leon Soryu. Fighting an uphill battle against Leon`s "Wind", Aichi experiences a different imagination for his fight. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 櫂, 敗れる!!
Kai Loses!!
Kai, Yabureru!!
episode.summary: The proud fighter, Toshiki Kai, and Emperor of the Card World, Kenji Mitsusada, face off in the third match of the shop battle. The two fighters with high potential are neck and neck in this climax fight where both of them use their trump cards. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: カムイ!! 決意のリベンジ
Kamui!! Revenge of Determination
Kamui!! Ketsui no Revenge
episode.summary: Voyage gets taken over by Asteroid. Kamui challenges a member of the strongest team "AL4", Kyou Yahagi, in an attempt to reclaim the place where he used to belong. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: それぞれの想い
Their Respective Feelings
Sorezore no Omoi
episode.summary: Misaki and Asaka battle. Ren Suzugamori, the leader of the Asteroids, appears during their fight. Meanwhile, Kyou suggests to Aichi and Kamui that thay should go "Asteroid Hunting". Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: FRIEND
Friend
Friend
episode.summary: Asaka Narumi of Team AL4 appears at Card Capital looking for the place that Kai belongs. Foreseeing that, Miwa faces Asaka and the Asteroids in an attempt to keep them away from Kai. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 覚醒!! PSY[サイ]クオリア
Awaken!! PSYqualia
Kakusei!! Psy Qualia
episode.summary: The one who spoke to Aichi while his movements were sealed by the lethal combo of Kyou`s "Dueling Dragon, ZANBAKU", was none other than the Blaster Blade from his imagination. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: サイカイ
Reunion
Saikai
episode.summary: Kai and Miwa enter the Asteroid headquarters and defeat the members. Elsewhere, after the fight with Tetsu, the exhausted Aichi and Kamui encounters the leader of Asteroid, Ren. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: テツの思惑
Tetsu`s Motive
Tetsu no Omowaku
episode.summary: Tetsu appears before Aichi and friends while they are Asteroid hunting. The hidden power of PSYqualia is discovered when Tetsu challenges Aichi to a cardfight for his research on PSYqualia. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 櫂とレン, そしてアイチ
Kai and Ren, and Aichi Too
Kai to Ren, Soshite Aichi
episode.summary: Kai recollects hanging out with Ren and Tetsu of Team AL4, and his reunion with Aichi, upon knowing that Ren paid a visit to Card Capital. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 漆黒の騎士!! ブラスター・ダーク
A Jet Black Knight!! Blaster Dark
Shikkoku no Kishi!! Blaster Dark
episode.summary: Aichi learns from Kyou that hearing the voices of cards is something known as "PSYqualia". And Misaki`s fight against Ren, who`s able to use that ability, is...... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 闇の深淵
Abyss of Darkness
Yami no Shin`en
episode.summary: Teams Q4 and AL4 gather at the Asteroid headquarters. Kai fights Ren in a decisive battle to protect Aichi. The battle begins between Kai, who denies the power of PSYqualia, and Ren, who is overflowing with that power. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 本気のファイト
A Serious Fight
Honki no Fight
episode.summary: Kai and Ren faces off in the destined match. While teams Q4 and AL4 watch on, Kai rides a new trump card. Who will come out on top in this serious fight? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 小さな光
A Little Beacon
Chiisana Hikari
episode.summary: The fight between the users of PSYqualia, Aichi and Ren, reaches its climax. Can Aichi overcome Ren, whose imaginations originate from a warped thirst, and sever the chains of these fights? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 櫂
Kai
Kai
episode.summary: Aichi and friends return to their peaceful days after the battle against Asteroid. A few days later, Kai challenges Aichi to a fight at Card Capital. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 先導者[ヴァンガード]
Vanguard
Vanguard
episode.summary: During the fight with Aichi, Kai begins to understand his feelings towards the fight. Aichi pushes forward with his PSYqualia during the fight. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ヴァンガ異変!? ユニット大図鑑!!
Vanguard Abnormality!? Unit Encyclopedia
Vanga Ihen!? Unit Oozukan!!
episode.summary: Aichi`s friends see him off as he heads towards the Asia Circuit as a representative of Japan. Meanwhile, in a mysterious dimension, familiar units and the clans they belong to are introduced. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: スタンドアップ! ハイスクール・ライフ!!
Stand Up! High School Life!!
episode.summary: Aichi`s wins in the Asia Circuit have him face off against Leon once more in the finals...... And after some time, Aichi`s now a high school student! However, Vanguard isn`t popular at all in Miyaji Academy, the school he has enrolled in. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: カードファイト部, 始めます!
Cardfight Club Initiated!
episode.summary: Kourin, from Ultrarare, transfers to Miyaji Academy, and joins Aichi`s Cardfight Club. As the club applicants who want to get to know Kourin gather, Aichi`s childhood acquaintance, Naoki, appears. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 新たな仲間
New Allies
episode.summary: Naoki takes on Kourin`s club entry test. Confronting his past self, he fights with all he has even though he`s a beginner. Can he grab hold of his future with his deck and Shin`s training? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 私のアイドル
My Idol
episode.summary: With Naoki`s entry, the club works towards gaining official approval. However, Naoki senses that he`s being watched. The culprit is none other than Shingo Komoi, who is interested to join the club. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 影の番長
The Backstage Boss
episode.summary: Misaki is feared as the Backstage Boss of Miyaji Academy. She keeps declining Aichi`s invitations to join the Cardfight Club to avoid troubling him, until Kourin can bear it no longer and challenges her to a fight. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 初めての交流戦
First Exchange Match
episode.summary: The Cardfight Club heads towards an exchange match. Their opponents, Fukuhara High VG Club, feature familiar faces from Asteroid such as Ren and Asaka, and also ULTRARARE member, Suiko. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ヴァンガード甲子園
Vanguard Koshien
episode.summary: Naoki and his powered up deck faces the experienced idol, Suiko. During the intense fight, "Takuto Tatsunagi" from the "Tatsunagi Foundation" makes his appearance. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: もうひとりの先導者(ヴァンガード)
Another Vanguard
episode.summary: Aichi and friends encounter the mysterious fighter, Kouji Ibuki. What is the power of "Delete" of the malicious "Deletor" units that belong to the person who taught Kai and Miwa Vanguard!? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: コンサートマスター タクト
Concert Master, Takuto
episode.summary: CF club returns to their peaceful daily routine after the exchange with Fukuhara. "Takuto Tatsunagi", the "Concert Master" and chairman of the Tatsunagi Foundation, reveals a shocking truth to ULTRARARE. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ディスティニーコンダクター
Destiny Conductor
episode.summary: Concert Master Takuto Tatsunagi challenges Ibuki to a fight to find out what the mysterious unit "Deletor" is. Takuto seems to have the advantage with PSYqualia, but...... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: PSY(サイ)クオリアゾンビ襲来
Invasion of the PSYqualia Zombie
episode.summary: As the "Destiny Conductor", Takuto commands Suiko and Rekka to go to Fukuhara. The aim of these girls is to infect the vanguard fighters with a certain power. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 運命(イメージ)を超えろ!
Beyond Imagination!
episode.summary: Ren fights the PSYqualia zombiefied Asaka to return her back to normal. However, with the power of PSYqualia, Asaka can only see a nightmare of herself defeating Ren. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 本当の力
True Strength
episode.summary: The invasion of the PSYqualia zombies spreads towards Card Capital. Kai brings forth the power of a new Overlord in order to save Kamui and the others who have become PSYqualia zombies. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 本物と偽者
True and Fake
episode.summary: Aichi and the CF club are brought by Kyou to the card shop. What awaits them are Rekka, who turned Kyou into a zombie, and a gang of PSYqualia zombies! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 幻のファイナルターン
Phantom Final Turn
episode.summary: Though Aichi defeated the PSYqualia zombies without breaking a sweat, Ibuki appears before him! Kyou, with his new power of PSYqualia, imagines himself defeating Ibuki with his new trump card, but...... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 歪められた絆
Distorted Bonds
episode.summary: Aichi is driven into a corner by the PSYqualia zombie Naoki. In the middle of their intense fight, the one who intervened in their imaginations was Kourin. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: コールドウォーカー 運命に支配されし者
Called Walkers - Those Ruled by Fate
episode.summary: Entrusting Naoki and Aichi to Shingo, Misaki heads for the Tatsunagi mansion, where she encounters Kourin. The curtain rises for the fight to release her beloved friend from her fate. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 絡みあう運命
Entangled Fate
episode.summary: Aichi finally awakens as the strongest PSYqualia zombie. Kai, Ren, and friends head for the Tatsunagi mansion upon contact from Misaki, but the one who stands in their way is none other than Ibuki. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 相克
Rivalry
episode.summary: Ibuki will not stop until Kai is deleted. Ibuki fights with the power of despair and resentment towards Vanguard, but PSYqualia reveals a light in his imagination of Kai from his memories. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最凶の敵・アイチ
The Vilest Enemy Aichi
episode.summary: PSYqualia zombie Aichi appears at the Tatsunagi mansion. Misaki fights to bring back the original Aichi, but Aichi`s strength has undergon a transformation into a different kind of ruthlessness. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 運命を指揮する者(ディスティニーコンダクター), その正体
The Truth of Destiny Conductor
episode.summary: Ren arrives at the Tatsunagi mansion, and challenges the mastermind behind this, the Destiny Conductor. But as Ren`s fight against the abnormal "Starhulk" units unfolds...... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 櫂の記憶
Kai`s Memory
episode.summary: PSYqualia zombie Aichi fights against Ibuki. The ability and anger contained within them clash at full force, but as the abnormal fight unfolds...... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 絆
Bonds
episode.summary: Although Aichi is released from the control of being PSYqualia zombie upon being deleted by Ibuki`s Deletors, Aichi loses his self as a Vanguard fighter as well. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ヴァンガードが消える日
The Day When Vanguard Disappears
episode.summary: The final battle that will decide the future of Vanguard begins with the actions of Aichi and the Destiny Conductor. Meanwhile, the forces of both planet Cray and wandering planet Brandt rally to war. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 救世主(メサイア)
Messiah
episode.summary: The deities of both planet Cray and planet Brandt descend in the final act. Fighting alongside his allies towards the conclusion of the distorted fate, the light of salvation appears within Aichi`s sword. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ヴァンガ異変!?ユニット大図鑑グレード2!!
Vanguard Abnormality!? Unit Encyclopedia Grade 2!!
episode.summary: The battle between the vanguards and the 2 planets...... isn`t over? The "little ones" have been called forth by the popularity once more...... to recreate that tournament that wasn`t reached in the main series Source: crunchyroll
